query: SELECT name FROM country WHERE population > 8000000 ORDER BY population ASC
SELECT name FROM country WHERE  name LIKE '%land%' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name FROM city WHERE population >= 500000 AND population <= 1000000 ORDER BY population ASC
SELECT name FROM country WHERE continent = 'Europe' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM country ORDER BY surfacearea ASC
SELECT city.name from city JOIN country ON country.code = city.countrycode WHERE country.name = 'Netherlands' ORDER BY city.name ASC
SELECT population  FROM city WHERE name = 'Rotterdam'
SELECT name  surfacearea FROM country ORDER BY surfacearea DESC  limit 10
SELECT name FROM city ORDER BY population DESC  limit 10
SELECT name from country where population =( SELECT MAX(population)  FROM country)
